ability.name: Magic Wand
ability.description: * Place any Wand on Magic Wand. * While a Wand is on Magic Wand: * All of your cards now count as Wands, as well as their original suit. * This includes Major Arcana: A Death, for example, counts as a "13 of Wands". * Discard the card on Magic Wand at will.
ability.flavor: "It's not the wand that's magic - the wand is nothing more than a prop to guide the eyes away from what's really happening. It's the magician who's magic."
